Key Arguments: The legislation threatens freedom of speech and the ability to express personal opinions.
The government should protect individual rights, not suppress them.
Past government actions during the pandemic show the dangers of defining and censoring 'misinformation'.
The example of Covid-19 vaccine information demonstrates the potential for government error in censoring information.
Notable Quotes: I strongly reject this proposed legislation.
The government will cause harm by silencing Australians!
This one example shows why giving the government even more power is a recipe for disaster.
